#Using While
```{r}
value<-0
counter<-0
while(value<50){
  value<-value+sample(1:10,1)
  counter<-counter+1
}

value;counter
```

#Using break
```{r}
for(i in 1:10){
  print(i)
  if(i==6){
    break;
  }
}
```

#Using next
```{r}
for(i in 1:10){
  if(i==6){
    next;
  }
  print(i)
}
```

#Using repeat
```{r}
value2<-0
repeat{
  value2<- print(value2+1)
  if(value2==5){
    break
  }
}
```

#Switch
```{r}


switchFuncion<- function(datas,option){
  switch (option,
  sum = sum(datas),
  sd= sd(datas),
  mean=mean(datas),
  median=median(datas),
  var=var(datas),
  max=max(datas),
  min=min(data))
}

datas<-sample(1:25,22)

switchFuncion(datas,"mean")
switchFuncion(datas,"sum")
switchFuncion(datas,"max")

```
